name: OpenDroneDiary
description: An open-source tool for managing drone flight logs. Provides features for tracking, analyzing, and managing flight data for drone pilots and aviation enthusiasts.

DATABASE_URL.description: PostgreSQL database connection URL. Automatically provided by Heroku Postgres add-on.

SMTP_HOST.description: SMTP server hostname for sending emails (e.g., smtp.gmail.com)

SMTP_FROM_EMAIL.description: From email address for outgoing emails

SMTP_FROM_NAME.description: From display name for outgoing emails

BASE_URL.description: Base URL for the application, used in email links

SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL.description: Slack webhook URL for sending notifications about user activities

GTM_ID.description: Google Tag Manager container ID for analytics tracking

TERMS_OF_SERVICE_URL.description: URL for terms of service page (enables terms checkbox on registration)

PRIVACY_POLICY_URL.description: URL for privacy policy page (displays link in footer)

LP_TOP_PAGE_URL.description: URL for landing page top page (displays link in footer)
